inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: presence of serum hepatitis B surface (HBsAg) for more than 6 months

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: signed the informed consent before liver biopsy

inclusion.criterion: no interferon or Nucleoside analogue treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: co-infection with hepatitis A virus (HAV), hepatitis C virus (HCV), hepatitis D virus (HDV) and/or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patient with a history of antiviral treatment
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: on IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months

exclusion.criterion: patient has medical condition that requires concurrent use of systemic prednisolone or other immunosuppressive agent (including chemotherapeutic agent)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patient has one or more additional known primary or secondary causes of liver disease, other than hepatitis B
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 53-year-old man with chronic HCV infection. He is on combination therapy for the past 9 months and has no evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis or metabolic liver disease.
